description: [Hikit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0009) is a [Rootkit](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1014) that has been used by [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001).(Citation: FireEye Hikit Rootkit) (Citation: FireEye HIKIT Rootkit Part 2)

external_references.description: Glyer, C., Kazanciyan, R. (2012, August 20). The “Hikit” Rootkit: Advanced and Persistent Attack Techniques (Part 1). Retrieved June 6, 2016.
Glyer, C., Kazanciyan, R. (2012, August 22). The “Hikit” Rootkit: Advanced and Persistent Attack Techniques (Part 2). Retrieved May 4, 2020.
